overview: Ron Jeremy's "Tabloid Taddler" is a sex gossip magazine devoting all its resources to finding out the surprise ending to the next big erotic novel, Hidden Fantasies. Sexual experimentation with three-ways, four-ways, anal and more are all being explored to make this the best erotic novel yet, but will Ron and his team be able to find what they're looking for in time for print?
title: All for One
